## Disease distribution over the decades 


```{r}

#Load Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
 
```


```{r}

Total_Outbreaks |>
   mutate(Decade = factor(cut(
      x = Year,
      breaks = seq(from = 1996,
                   to = 2026,
                   by = 10),
      labels = c("1996-2005", "2006-2015", "2016-2026")
   ))) |>
  group_by(Decade, icd11l1) |> 
  count() |> 
  ggplot(mapping = 
            aes(x = Decade,
                y = n,
                fill = icd11l1)) +
   geom_bar(stat = "identity",
            position = "dodge",
            color = "black",
            alpha = 0.5) + 
  labs(title = "Outbreaks by Disease type Over Decades",
        x = "Decade",
        y = "Count",
        fill = "Disease type ICD-11") +
   theme_minimal() +
   theme(
      axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12),  
      legend.text = element_text(size = 8),   
      plot.title = element_text(size = 14),   
      axis.title.x = element_text(size = 12), 
      axis.title.y = element_text(size = 12)
              
)
```
